channel.title: Geckoscape v2 Highly Improved
channel.description:
[center]Project gecko is a project i started awhile ago, and highly improved latley. It hit me awhile ago i didnt know much about the 317 client so i decided to do some client work. In this case it was adding new sprites and custom tabs. This server has alot of things to do is well written. I used maybe two tutorials out of this whole thing. And they where very minor.
Im going to toss the credits in right here: Makie - used some of his sprites Sagi - base Me - coding Random Snipplets (like 3).
Features:
[ul][li]Client Sided[/li]
[li]Added A Custom Quest Tab (See Pictures)[/li]
[li]Added A More Modern Equipment Tab (See Pictures)[/li]
[li]Removed File Menus And Fixed The Login Sprites[/li]
[li]Customized Npc's[/li]
[li]Added Hover Buttons To Everything[/li][/ul]
[ul][li]Server Sided[/li]
[li]Added All Custom Quest Tab Teleports(See Pictures)[/li]
[li]Crystal Chest With Keys[/li]
[li]Working Lamp Effects (See Pictures)[/li]
[li]All Stalls Appear And Disappear[/li]
[li]Working Fun Pk (Don't Lost Items)[/li]
[li]Tree's Go Down And Return Correct Stumps[/li]
[li]Mage At Home Teleports You With Emotes (See Pictures)[/li]
[li]Set Bank Pins Flawlessly[/li]
[li]Mutli Dialouge Npc's[/li]
[li]Locking Experience, And Items On Death Interface[/li]
[li]Fully Functional Deposit Box[/li]
[li]Custom Npcs, Such As Ranger And Mage (Correct Animations, See Pictures)[/li]
[li]Shops With Mutli Dialouge[/li]
[li]Good Fishing, Repeats Correct Emotes[/li]
[li]Nice Clean Home[/li]
[li]uncomment applyNew(); in client.java for a welcome dialouge[/li]
[li]Very Good Woodcutting[/li]
[li]Check Bank Command[/li]
[li]Modified Godwars[/li]
[li]Ranger And Mage Eat[/li]
[li]custom Training Caves[/li][/ul]
Pictures: [IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/2m51cb8.png[/img] [IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/2nanz3p.png[/img] [IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/35k8qok.png[/img] [IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/29fqyxk.png[/img] [IMG]http://i54.tinypic.com/157nkm0.png[/img] [IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/2eluogn.png[/img] [IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/jslnae.png[/img] [IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/15rdt2w.png[/img] [IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/34j4ntf.png[/img] [IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/2urgy.png[/img] [IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/2quusqs.png[/img] [IMG]http://i54.tinypic.com/2jhcex.png[/img] [IMG]http://i54.tinypic.com/244pdw1.png[/img] [IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/11sig45.png[/img] [IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/29bd3lv.png[/img] [IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/wcemtf.png[/img] [IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/14y8myv.png[/img] [IMG]http://i53.tinypic.com/2lswvon.png[/img] [IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/2hgbldt.png[/img]
Download: http://uppit.com/yipfcf69mk2j/Desktop.rar
[/center]

@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“R A R E S, post:15, topic:409620”]There are a few reasons why I like this.

The interfaces are pretty awesome, deposit box is something I haven’t seen in a server.
The old graphics, but still pulling off a good server is something not a lot of people can do
NOT FULL OF CUSTOMS AND STILL CONTAINING A KICKASS 317

10/10 GJ

R++ didn’t see that you had 200 rep :p[/quote]fj had working bank deposit o.0
